summaryEn: The fear repeats in meetings, articles, and podcasts: 'Artificial intelligence will replace Product Managers.' And every time I hear it, I think of an airplane. That airplane where the autopilot flies for hours, yet there's still a pilot and co-pilot in command.

titleEs: Pasaron 5 a帽os: por qu茅 ya es hora de refrescar la Gu铆a Scrum

summaryEs: Hace cinco a帽os se lanz贸 la gu铆a Scrum 2020, reducida y simplificada para abarcar m谩s industrias. Desde esa fecha, aunque se han acumulado mejoras, no ha habido una actualizaci贸n oficial. Scrum naci贸 como respuesta a lo complejo. Hoy, con una gu铆a de 13 p谩ginas pero sin actualizar desde 2020, corre el riesgo de volverse irrelevante sin soporte pr谩ctico actualizado.
summaryEn: Five years ago, the 2020 Scrum Guide was launched, reduced and simplified to cover more industries. Since then, although improvements have accumulated, there has been no official update. Scrum was born as a response to complexity. Today, with a 13-page guide outdated since 2020, it risks becoming irrelevant without updated practical support.
